fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Select a target to give vulnerable defense for the night
-Select yourself to give yourself vulnerable defense for the night (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You learn if your target is attacked that night
-this is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make the good faction lose (May win while dead)
